vocabinfos.mediumDef:
Also named: elaiōn<\i> (ἐλαιών "Olivet" G1638)
§ This name is used for:
1) olive, olive tree
1a) olive tree
1b) olives
n pr loc
2) mountain facing Jerusalem on the east side

2) 面对耶路撒冷东方的山
